attributes.action: End the Banking cut of date's for all employers and employees
attributes.additional_details: Banking cut off dates cause financial uncertainty which can cause the person effected to have increased debt and eventually become homeless and unemployed this could increase the national debt and homeless numbers could rise
attributes.background: Make it illeagel for a person to not be paid due to banking cut of dates

rejection.details: If you're concerned about your employer, you may wish to contact the Advisory, Conciliation and Arbitration Service (ACAS): https://www.acas.org.uk/if-your-wages-are-not-paid
